review: I purchased the Fire tv stick for an older smart tv. Though I was able to stream prime movies the software was running slow and was not getting updated. The fire tv stick is super fast, updated interface and remote that does not require direct line of sight. I love how it moves from episode to episode - perfect for binge watching. You can also play games if you're interested.
